languages.text: {n}Джай накручивает локон волос на палец и бросает на вас пылающий взгляд — который, впрочем, тут же прячет под ресницами.{/n} "Я... надеюсь, что вскорости мы сможем переговорить с глазу на глаз. Пока что же не буду воровать драгоценное время Вольного Торговца и далее..."

{n}Jae twirls a lock of hair around her finger and sends a fiery gaze your way, which she immediately hides beneath her lowered lashes.{/n} "I... do hope we will get a chance to have a conversation in private very soon. For now, however, I dare not steal any more of the Rogue Trader's precious time..."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай накручивает локон волос на палец и бросает на вас пылающий взгляд — который, впрочем, тут же прячет под ресницами.{/n} "Я... надеюсь, что вскорости мы сможем переговорить с глазу на глаз. Пока что же не буду воровать драгоценное время Вольного Торговца и далее..."

For now, however, I dare not steal any more of the Rogue Trader's precious time..."

For now, however, I dare not steal any more of the Rogue Trader's precious time..."

languages.text: {n}婕伊将一绺头发绕在手指上，对你露出了炽热的目光，但随后便立刻将目光藏在了低垂的睫毛下面。{/n}“我……我很希望之后能有机会，和你私下里谈谈。至于现在，我不敢继续占用行商浪人的宝贵时间……”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae twirls a lock of hair around her finger and sends a fiery gaze your way, which she immediately hides beneath her lowered lashes.{/n} "I... do hope we will get a chance to have a conversation in private very soon. For now, however, I dare not steal any more of the Rogue Trader's precious time..."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊将一绺头发绕在手指上，对你露出了炽热的目光，但随后便立刻将目光藏在了低垂的睫毛下面。{/n}“我……我很希望之后能有机会，和你私下里谈谈。至于现在，我不敢继续占用行商浪人的宝贵时间……”

languages.text: {n}Jae dreht sich eine Strähne ihrer Haare um den Finger und wirft dir einen feurigen Blick zu, den sie aber sofort wieder unter gesenkten Lidern verbirgt.{/n} "Ich ... hoffe, wir haben sehr bald Gelegenheit zu einer Unterredung unter vier Augen. Vorerst aber wage ich es nicht, noch mehr der kostbaren Zeit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu stehlen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae twirls a lock of hair around her finger and sends a fiery gaze your way, which she immediately hides beneath her lowered lashes.{/n} "I... do hope we will get a chance to have a conversation in private very soon. For now, however, I dare not steal any more of the Rogue Trader's precious time..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae dreht sich eine Strähne ihrer Haare um den Finger und wirft dir einen feurigen Blick zu, den sie aber sofort wieder unter gesenkten Lidern verbirgt.{/n} "Ich ... hoffe, wir haben sehr bald Gelegenheit zu einer Unterredung unter vier Augen. Vorerst aber wage ich es nicht, noch mehr der kostbaren Zeit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu stehlen ..."

languages.text: {n}Jae enroule une mèche de ses cheveux autour d'un de ses doigts et vous lance un regard ardent qu'elle s'empresse de masquer en battant des cils.{/n} « J'espère... avoir l'occasion de vous parler en privé très bientôt. Mais pour le moment, je ne vous ferai pas perdre plus de votre temps si précieux... »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae twirls a lock of hair around her finger and sends a fiery gaze your way, which she immediately hides beneath her lowered lashes.{/n} "I... do hope we will get a chance to have a conversation in private very soon. For now, however, I dare not steal any more of the Rogue Trader's precious time..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae enroule une mèche de ses cheveux autour d'un de ses doigts et vous lance un regard ardent qu'elle s'empresse de masquer en battant des cils.{/n} « J'espère... avoir l'occasion de vous parler en privé très bientôt. Mais pour le moment, je ne vous ferai pas perdre plus de votre temps si précieux... »

languages.text: {n}Jae retuerce un mechón de pelo con el dedo y te lanza una mirada fogosa que pronto oculta tras las pestañas.{/n} «Es... espero que podamos conversar en privado muy pronto. Sin embargo, Comerciante Independiente, no es momento de robarle más de su valioso tiempo...».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae twirls a lock of hair around her finger and sends a fiery gaze your way, which she immediately hides beneath her lowered lashes.{/n} "I... do hope we will get a chance to have a conversation in private very soon. For now, however, I dare not steal any more of the Rogue Trader's precious time..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae retuerce un mechón de pelo con el dedo y te lanza una mirada fogosa que pronto oculta tras las pestañas.{/n} «Es... espero que podamos conversar en privado muy pronto. Sin embargo, Comerciante Independiente, no es momento de robarle más de su valioso tiempo...».

languages.text: {n}ジェイは髪の束を指に絡ませ、燃えるような視線をまつ毛の下からこちらに送る。{/n}「あの…近いうちに二人きりでで話せるといいな。だけど、とりあえず今は、自由開拓者さんの大切な時間を邪魔しないようにするよ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae twirls a lock of hair around her finger and sends a fiery gaze your way, which she immediately hides beneath her lowered lashes.{/n} "I... do hope we will get a chance to have a conversation in private very soon. For now, however, I dare not steal any more of the Rogue Trader's precious time..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは髪の束を指に絡ませ、燃えるような視線をまつ毛の下からこちらに送る。{/n}「あの…近いうちに二人きりでで話せるといいな。だけど、とりあえず今は、自由開拓者さんの大切な時間を邪魔しないようにするよ…」

languages.text: {n}Jae, saçının bir tutamını parmağına sarıp sana şehvetli bir bakış attıktan hemen sonra gözlerini, alçalttığı kirpiklerinin ardına saklıyor.{/n} "Dilerim... Yakında baş başa görüşme imkânımız olur. Fakat şu anda Hür Tacir'in kıymetli vaktini daha fazla harcamak istemem..."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae twirls a lock of hair around her finger and sends a fiery gaze your way, which she immediately hides beneath her lowered lashes.{/n} "I... do hope we will get a chance to have a conversation in private very soon. For now, however, I dare not steal any more of the Rogue Trader's precious time..."
